alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:06AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique near Basile. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding occurs on portions of Riverside Road north of Saint Jules Road and the road is subject to closure. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 26.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
